resources.string:
1) Go to Quizzes section from bottom navigation.
2) Select chapter.
3) Select topic.
4) Solve the quiz by filling all necessary details and click submit
5) Click 'View Score' to check score.

1) Open the notes section and follow the same procedure mentioned in FAQ #1.\n2) Open the note in Google Drive app or any browser.\n3) Click the Download button and voila! Now you can access it offline.

1) Navigate to setting menu.
2) Select the medium from setting options.
3) Select medium as English or Marathi.
4) (Optional) You can switch to light and dark mode from settings.
5) The settings currently applied will be shown on the right.
6) Content you see in other tabs is based on settings applied.

1) All assessments will be timed.
2) Enter the code provided to you.
3) Read the instructions carefully and click 'Start'.
4) Don't forget to manually Submit as form will not be auto submitted.
5) Submit at least 15 seconds before test ends so that you can check your score.
● How to change medium and class?

1) As soon as you press the 'Start' button, exam will begin.
2) Time left will be shown at top.
3) You will get only 1 chance to solve the test.
4) DON'T FORGET TO SUBMIT TEST BEFORE TIMER RUNS OUT.
Report submitted: Sorry for the inconvenience
Only post subject related doubts here. Do not put your queries regarding the app here. There is a separate section for this. Our experts will answer your query within 24 hr.
Once our experts answer it, it will appear in the Doubt section.
